caption.title: Binding energy of receptor-ligand complex for the template (A) and modeled complex between Geldanamycin and swine HSP90AB1 (B) during MD simulations (10 ns).
caption.p: ΔE vdw refer to Van der Waal energy, ΔE elec refer to electrostatic energy, ΔE mm refer to total potential energy between the protein and ligand (ΔE mm = ΔE vdw + ΔE elec), ΔE pol refer to polar solvation energy, ΔE apol refer to non-polar solvation energy and ΔE binding refer to the total binding energy (ΔE binding = ΔE mm + ΔE pol + ΔE apol).
Click here for additional data file.
